attributes.additional_details:
Foreign aid should be stopped, until the alleged black hole in our budget is filled 
We can no longer fund foreign aid, as we have more pressing needs in the uk.
Pensioners winter heating allowance should be restored for all.
More money could be spent on NHS, new prisons, and police officers on the beat who are never seen.
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe foreign aid to be outdated and needs to be reformed

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Stop all foreign aid: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700263

You may also wish to sign this petition:

Reverse changes to Winter Fuel Payment: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700074
